entries.message:
Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Seoul location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2023-10-18 19:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2023-10-18 21:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Seoul instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
An outage or maintenance window is affecting a subset of users in this region. Detailed outage information is available in the customer portal if this event is impacting your resources.
We are currently experiencing a partial outage in our Madrid location. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.
